page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN SWANMORE
page.content: We counted 52 different occupations in the Village, known to us. The children interviewed some of the people who work in Swanmore. {Ben and Nicholas interviewed Mr. and {Mrs. Smith, Dairy Farmers:}They woke up at 5.00 a.m. two mornings ago to find their three bulls had broken down a gate and got into the hayfield. They went out and managed to drive them back and mended the gate. They were about to go to bed when they noticed that a cow had broken through another fence, so they had to mend that too and finally went back to bed at 6.45 a.m. {Sally interviewed the School Cook:} Mrs. Pennial says she loves her work and I saw her do the pizzas. She doesn't like making pastry, but she likes doing the puddings and the chips.
